my employee liked the look so ill buy him one as well

I purchased a similar Eisenhower jacket last year from Dickie. It was very stiff and the zipper broke within a couple of months… This jacket is not stiff has more pockets and is very comfortable to wear… I highly recommend it.
Quality jacket material, but the zipper is not so great. The jacket zipper tends to get stuck while trying to zip it up.
They are so stiff and I should have definitely gotten a bigger size. The size chart lies.
Red kap has been good for years

Runs large, order a size below what you normally do. I usually wear an xl so I ordered a L, fits perfectly. It has wrist cuffs and 2 inside chest pockets which makes it different from their slash pocket jacket. Also water resistant.

I really like the red cap jackets.  I've been issued a few over the years.  The material is a ripstop type and seems a little thin.  The cuffs are a hidden elastic type like what other brands did.  This is not advertised and I prefer a buttoned loose cuff to wrench in.

评论概述: Great work jacket, though the fit is a little odd.
评论详情: It's a great work jacket, nicely insulated and plenty of good pockets. The fit/shape of the jacket is a little odd, to me anyways.  The shoulders are super wide, which does allow for decent mobility but it creates a very "box-ey" fit. Moving your arms/shoulders around tends to lift the whole jacket up quite a lot because of the shoulder fit.  The sleeves are nice, I like the double cuff style with the elastic ends on the inside. They are fairly snug on the wrist/lower forearm however, which doesn't quite lend itself to rolling up your sleeves a bit if you wanted to.

评论概述: Good features, quality, and price. NOT from Asia.
评论详情: I don't write a lot of reviews, but this Red Kap jacket is more than I hoped for. Since Carhartt discontinued their twill + lined jacket several years ago I have been without an option. These are better, actually, and are made in Mexico - not overseas -  if North American MFG matters to you. The specs/features are not fully described online as far as I can tell. This fabric blend is more Poly, less Cotton (20%) than a Carhartt, but it's fine. The 2 big inside pockets have snaps. One of the slash pockets also has a snap. Internal wrist cuffs are new to me but working out. The only thing I might add is an external cuff snap. You can't really go wrong for about $50. When these are fresh you can get away with wearing them anywhere. Will order more. Good job, Red Kap.
Aunque es un poco cara es una muy buena chamarra de trabajo. Yo la compro una y otra vez para mi esposo. Muy durables.

评论概述: Medium Is Way Too Large, Looks and Feels Bulky
评论详情: I'm 5'9", 185 lbs, with 32" waist. My shoulders are a bit more broad than average for my height, so I can usually fit a 44 regular blazer, so I ordered this coat in medium. It is exceedingly bulky on me. I will return, but don't know if I should re-order in small. As this had to travel very far and thru a very round about way... from Illinois to seattle wa to portland oregon then back to WA state to Spokane, and took 3 days longer than advertised, even with prime....  I will try to find a local shop that sells this so I can try it or a similar jacket on in store. I may have to go with dickies, as I know their large jacket of the exact same style fits me better than the medium red cap does.
Snap ripped off after opening the pocket one time. Item arrived in a busted up and ripped clear bag as well.

评论概述: Not like they used to be

It’s not made in America and no longer then having slipped it on and off the stitching holding the insulation in came apart. I’m returning it

评论概述: Medium too small, large is too big
评论详情: I’m typically sized and generally wear medium coats. This coat in medium is far too tight, and the large wears like a bag. Something is off when it comes to sizing at Red Kap. If this coat fit OK, I’d be happy — the quality is much better than similar work coats like Dickies.
Fast shipping

Model size 6’2” 220lbs Jacket size Medium Many reviewers have stated to purchase a size down due to the product running large. This was not my experience. Jacket was tight and constricting. I did not want to exchange for a Large because the manufacturer never responded to my email asking about waist length or any other available measurements. The waist length of this style of jacket was too short for me. I think Medium may fit 5’10” 180lbs properly. If you want a high waist style. They look good and professional in photos but I don’t feel comfortable when any movement shows your belt line/possibly skin. I provided the measurement from zipper top to zipper bottom for reference, 24” total.
This was a gift for my son. The medium fits him well, and we added name tapes, so that my son can be identified by name in his auto mechanics class.
This jacket fit well and looks good. The insulation is helpful on chilly days, and the material seems to be tough. I wear this jacket for yard work and jobs around the home.
Seems well made, I’m 5’9” 180 pounds and bought the medium, fits somewhat tight on me probably should have got a large but sleeves are long enough
Great jacket. Especially riding on a motorcycle.
Nice looking work jacket or just casual wear
Good materials and fit nice
Seemed to be cheaply made. Didn't fit good so I sent it back. Where did Amazon customer service go? They make everything almost impossible.  You can't understand them most of the time......

Its anice design and fits me well as a M. Im 5’11 158pounds. I really like the design, its just like the dickies eisenhower jacket…. Butttt!!! There is a design flaw, after wearing it for a few days, it starts to lent heavy and stain easily( the material draws a lot of lint/cotton) and it easily stains but not with food. After you wear it a few day, you start to notice the color gets dirty. Thats the downside to the jacket, i would have rather spent the money on the dickies version, the dickies is tougher and stronger. This should be priced in the 20-30$ range based on its quality, other than that the design is good. Since ive had the jacket, i feel like someone else used the jacket, they then dry cleaned it and sent it to me. Its not worth the fee. Youre better off buying the dickies version.

Nothing to dislike. Looks good, very nice fit, not heavy, warm enough to layer up if needed, nice navy blue. Slightly larger than expected but gives me room to add extra layers of warmth if needed. Left and right inside pockets are nice. Seems to be pretty tough so far. I’ve been subjecting it to many hard hours of work and it’s holding up. Work type: truck driving, forklift, cold environments, warehouse dock work, loading/ unloading.
Was a little leary never orderd a jacket without trying it on first and after reading some reviews was a little worried about the fit but I am pleased with it

I was issued a similar jacket at my previous place of employment but I can’t wear it at my current place of employment due to the logos. So I was pleased to find this jacket. It’s inexpensive and surprisingly high quality. The buttons on the pockets make me more comfortable when working with things in my pockets. The inner pockets are nice too. I like the elastic cuffs, it makes for a more insulated feel. And the flap covering the zipper is by far my favorite feature, I never worry about the zipper getting caught or scratching any car when I’m working. Overall a nice jacket. I ordered a large which is my normal size and it fits just right. Not to snug to where I get too hot but not too big to where I feel weighted down.
I’m 6 foot and 187lbs. Jacket was a little short in the sleeves and to the waist for me. If there’s big and tall I’d go with that.
Warm

Great length, it's a little wide but I'm a skeleton so no fault of Red Kap. If you have animals, this attracts their hair like a magnet so hang it up when not in use. Good material, comfortable and warm; an excellent light jacket. Almost all of the stitching's ends were long and sticking out, but a few minutes with a lighter cleaned them all up and now it looks slick.
I work for a production plant and our uniforms shirts are navy blue or light blue and this jacket looks great with both I would definitely recommend

I have always loved Red Kap work coats. Their just right for southern Kentucky winters this one is even better than the older ones it has two inside pockets that are just the right size. It also has a zipper cover to prevent scratches

Nice Jacket. Comfortable. Nice and plain without any silly design. People here are complaining about loose threads. If you never worked for a company that provides uniforms, know that you have to trim the loose threads from manufacturing like pretty much anything from a uniform company. The sleeves are a little long but I just cuffed them like in my picture and they are fine now. It's a little short though, it comes down right below the belt line. If you are tall, have a long torso, or don't tuck in your shirts, you might want to get the Red Kap Panel Jacket instead, which is a little longer. I'm 5'7" and 240 pounds, I got the 2XL and it's a decent fit for me. If you have a gut like me there is not a lot of room for it. I'm about 48" around the chest and 50" around at the belly button and it is not tight on my stomach but just about right. If you are fatter than 52" around the stomach this jacket will be too small when you sit down with it zipped up. If your stomach is more than a couple inches bigger around than your chest, I would say this is not a good jacket design for you. The chest area of the jacket is bigger than the stomach area. My shoulders are 20 inches wide measured from the outside of the arms and it's a good fit. If your shoulders are wider than 21 inches measured from the outside of the arms then this jacket will be too small for you. I can barely get hands in the inside pockets. The palm of my hand is 4" wide. If the palms of your hands are wider than 4", the inside pockets will be too small to get your hands in. I wish it had pockets on the chest. The outside pockets are nicely insulated to keep your hands warm. The fabric is a ripstop weave which you cannot see in the pictures. I think it looks cool and will post a picture of it. I also posted a picture of what the inside looks like.
This is Not Brand New. The overall fit and material is good but I think this is a used item
Good quality.

(I am going to buy another one if this one wears out) 5'9, 183 lbs fits perfectly the problem is, it fits too perfectly not small, not big, just a perfect fit for my body (since I was looking for a more loose fit, i found this a bit disturbing because some reviews were suggesting to go down a size) feels a little bit tight when i raise my arm (but this is the nature of how the jacket is built), but feels very comfortable, thin but quite warm nice jacket

I've been wearing Red Kap clothing as street fashion for about a year now. The clothing is 100% true to fit. If you order a 2x thats what you're getting. Also, these are the best quality clothing items I think I've ever purchased at any price point. This jacket is beautiful. Wouldn't dare wear it to a manual labor style job. 评论概述: True fit, even for tall men.
评论详情: My husband loves this jacket. He likes the pocket placement, the length of the sleeves and waist, the fit and the comfort of the material. It is durable but not stiff like his Carhart. This is his go-to work jacket.
Best utility Jacket since the black Navy utility Jacket and very comfortable.
Beautiful jacket, fit well. I was looking for a LIGHTWEIGHT jacket for spring or cool summer nights. This is for much cooler weather and the description does not inform you it's a heavy coat.
Would buy agine good coat

评论概述: Great quality but expect it to fit a little large
评论详情: Great quality jacket, a little bigger than expected but I got the idea of hitting it it with a clothing steamer and following that with a diffuser heat gun. It snugged it up perfectly, I can't claim it will work for everyone but it you are careful it may help snug up your jacket if needed.

Made very well. Machine washable
Nice

评论概述: In most ways a top quality Eisenhower style shop jacket
评论详情: Long time wearer of the other top brand of this type of jacket. Their prices went up and I decided to try this one. This jacket is much better in many ways in my opinion. I like the zipper flap in the front. The cuffs on this are very nice with a hidden knitted cuff under the visible one. The fit is perfect for me.  What I don’t like... though it is a nice touch most pockets have a hidden snap to hold closed. I’m not confident in how they will hold up with regular use. I wish they used a better zipper. Though it works it isn’t that smooth to operate. The waist straps on the sides are non function so it would have been better to leave them off.

This jacket is perfect. Most importantly, it has a tailored/tapered cut and fit, so its wide in the chest and shoulders and narrows at the waist. This is exactly the fit I was looking for. The pockets are well designed and the inside pocket is perfect for my cell phone. I wore it in 30 degree weather the other night and I was warm enough. The inside pocket and outer right pocket can both be snapped shut. A nice feature if you have something you want to feel secure about while walking around. I highly recommend this item if you want a fitted look, and do not recommend it if you need something with "more room in the middle", For a bigger middle I would suggest a different model, but the quality of Red Kap is top notch.
Large warm jacket for the shop or worksite. Fits great and comfortable.
Not the same as in the picture. I had to return it.  don’t get it the material is bad

Sizing is a bit off. I bought a large and it fits like a medium. Can’t wear it with a hoody under.  Have had it for a month and worn maybe 3-4 times. The cuffs are fraying; the button broke.  Just spend the money and get carhartt or tough duck

Having had this jacket for a little over a week, its quickly become my favourite. It's relatively lightweight and easy to wear over hoodies, flannel shirts or polos, it is reasonably warm and mildly breathable. A sound option to layer up for outdoors in Spring or Autumn or wear over a t-shirt if working inside. I'm 6'2", 85kg with long arms a medium fits me well, indicating this Redkap sizing runs large. It has two large inner pockets sealable with press studs, good for phones or notebooks, two outer pockets, one that has a stud and showerproof coating - which is surprisingly effective in medium rain. One complaint is that stitching seems a bit patchy - and while nothing has come undone yet, I have removed more than a couple of loose strands. Pretty happy overall given fit, subtle style and it's suitability as comfortable, practical workwear.
